List of all members.

Protected Member Functions

void initDNA (const char *bdnaOrg, int dnalen)

Detailed Description

The b3DefaultSerializer is the main Bullet serialization class. The constructor takes an optional argument for backwards compatibility, it is recommended to leave this empty/zero.

Definition at line 139 of file b3Serializer.h.
